knimeNode.name: Service Table Input
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads the content of a table from an external caller (e.g a Call Workflow node).

fullDescription.intro:
This node simplifies orchestrating KNIME workflows using the Call Workflow node. It defines the input of a workflow, which callers such as the Call Workflow node can inject a KNIME table to.
If a data table is connected to the optional input, the node will simply forward this table to the output port unless a table is supplied via the REST API, in which case the supplied table will be available at the output port.
If no input is given, a default table is output.
fullDescription.option: A name for the input parameter(preferably unique). This name is exposed in the REST interface and in the Call Workflow node.
A description for the input parameter. The description is shown in the API specification of the REST interface.

ports.inPort: An optional input that is directly forwarded to the output of the node, unless overwritten by supplying a table via the REST API.
ports.outPort: The injected table, default table if no table has been injected.
